subject: Plus X vs Latest Plus X
description_text:
Hello,

I am just wondering what the difference between the Plus X and Latest Plus X pedals are. I am planning on ordering via amazon and I see two versions but I dont see any differences in the description. The Latest Plus X are about $40 more for the two pedal set w/ baseplate

Thanks and hope you have a great day!
Austin

conversations.body_text: Hi，Austin Megna，  The two version is the same item, you can choose the cheaper one
